tweet: How we will launch Shelley: With the Byron reboot currently underway, here's @IOHK_Charles with an essential new whiteboard video to take us through the process we'll be following to launch #Shelley #Cardano @Cardano  https://t.co/hGl3IqmNB1  https://t.co/zcHBejdTmW

Heads up! The coming weeks and months, the #Cardano #blockchain will undergo various upgrades and releases.   To stay up to date, check if you're subscribed and have notifications turned on for:   @InputOutputHK Twitter   And #IOHK #YouTube channel:  https://t.co/imx4WVXyxW #ada

The Cardano Foundation is hiring a Technical Project Manager. This is a full-time, remote position, so if you're well-organized, highly technical, know blockchain, and are stuck at home due to COVID-19, take a look at our job req below.   https://t.co/ZPmzXWNmPL

Daedalus Flight is our new community testing program. Yesterday, we released a fresh mainnet wallet candidate, featuring NEW wallet restore and spending passwords. Want to get involved? #WIndows users are especially welcome! @Cardano #daedalus #Cardano  https://t.co/PfHvSEpgOm  https://t.co/nOxGuNjKr0

The #Byron era slowly ends and #Cardano will be a fully decentralized network. We will enter into the #Shelley era.  We have described the whole process for you based on Charles's video:  https://t.co/dpn8lf59CY  #blockchain #crypto $ADA
